actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution amending clause 7 of rule XIII of the Rules of the House.

summary.text: Amends rules XIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that each committee report accompanying a public bill or joint resolution contain an evaluation of the paperwork which would be incurred in carrying out such bill or resolution including estimates of time and cost required of affected parties, a showing of whether the effect of the bill could be substantial, and an estimate of recordkeeping requirements.

titles.title: Resolution amending clause 7 of rule XIII of the Rules of the House.
